titles.title: And Is It So- I Shall Be Like Thy Son

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And is it so- I shall be like Thy Son? Is this the grace which He for me has won? Father of glory- thought beyond all thought!- In glory, to Him own blest likeness brought!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, Jesus, Lord, who loved me like Thee? Fruit of Thy work, with Thee, too, there to see Thy glory, Lord, while endles ages roll, Myself the prize and travail of Thy soul.{/lang-eng}
